data.name: Nobody - The Turnaround Demo
data.detailed_description:
Nobody is set in a very similar parallel world to the reality. The protagonist here doesn’t live in the concrete and steel jungle, but within a more worldly and rural area that is located under the shadow of the skyscrapers.
You, as one of the ordinary “Nobodies” in this world, don’t have distinguished family background, elite education, or once-in-a-lifetime business opportunities. However, through hard work and determination, you might be able to get rid of the troubles eventually and make your way in this realistic society.

Discord: https://discord.gg/MWbwZSY
Twitter: @ThermiteGamesHQ

Game Features

Highly Realistic World & Compassionate Music
The realistic art style and exquisite game graphics have built an extremely life-like world. Together with the beautiful soundtrack, the game offers you an unforgettable audiovisual feast and an immersive gaming experience.

Realistic Scenes and Incredible Freedom
The game has perfectly reconstructed real-life scenes and provides much freedom, so that you could actually experience real life in this parallel world.

Rich Gameplay and System
The game contains various gameplay contents, including work, social relations and romantic relationships, consumption, entertainment, etc., you can start another life in the world of Nobody.

The Most Realistic Management Simulation
You will need to constantly pay attention to the character's emotions, state of mind, satiety, and other states, and improve his or her abilities through studying and working. Make a living, find your way in the city, and even pursue your dreams.

The Most Inspiring Story
You play as a young person who has just arrived in the metropolis and lives in the worldly living area of the city. Will you hold on to the hope in the midst of adversity and eventually get out of the predicament, or will you rather lose yourself in the hard life and die out? Your choices, your story.

data.short_description: Nobody is a realistic survival simulator set in a parallel world with a similar background to the actual society. Struggling in a predicament, you will need to manage your time and resources, and strive to find your way through difficult times.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7
  • Processor: i3-530 2.93GHZ 2 Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 750 Ti 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: GPU must support Shader Model 5.0
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10(64-Bit)
  • Processor: i7-7700k 4.2GHz 4 Core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 1660 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: GPU must support Shader Model 5.0

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6
  • Processor: 2.5+ GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or better, Radeon HD 7950 or better, Shader Model 3.0
  • Storage: 14 GB available space
